body_html: @tensorflowbutler I find out when doing the same work, the depthwise_conv2d is much more memory friendly than the matrix element-wise multiplication. I'm running with the depthwise_conv2d and free from the "out of memory" error now.
body_text: @tensorflowbutler I find out when doing the same work, the depthwise_conv2d is much more memory friendly than the matrix element-wise multiplication. I'm running with the depthwise_conv2d and free from the "out of memory" error now.
body: @tensorflowbutler I find out when doing the same work, the depthwise_conv2d is much more memory friendly than the matrix element-wise multiplication. I'm running with the depthwise_conv2d and free from the "out of memory" error now.
